title: Quick mushroom curry
directions: Peel and slice the onions. Fry them gently in the vegetable oil for 2-3 minutes.
Peel and crush the garlic and stir it into the mixture along with the peas and turmeric. Stir fry for 5 minutes.
Deseed and finely chop the chillis. Trim and slice the mushrooms. Stir the chillis, mushrooms and coriander into the curry and cook for a further 5 minutes.
ingredients: 125g/4 Â½ oz fresh or frozen peas
